channel.title: TaiwanPlus - Latest News
channel.description: Your source of news, culture, and infotainment from Taiwan, a voice of freedom in Asia.

item.title: Indigenous Activists Set To Leave Encampment After Years of Protest
item.description: Indigenous activists, including singer Panai Kusui, are packing up their encampment near Taiwan's Presidential Office after nearly eight years of calling for the government to retu

item.title: Large Thunderstorms Lead to Flooding in Penghu Islands
item.description: Large thunderstorms have caused flooding in Taiwan's outlying Penghu Islands.

item.title: Tainan Ramps Up Prevention Measures Against Dengue Fever
item.description: Tainan is ramping up prevention measures to limit mosquitoes in preparation for a possible dengue fever outbreak.

item.title: Indigenous Activists Break Camp To End 8-Year Sit-In Protest in Taipei
item.description: Indigenous activists who have camped out near the Presidential Office for the duration of Tsai Ing-wen's presidency are ending their sit-in. They say the Tsai administration has fa
